questions.text: Does this align with our family’s values?
Is this our greatest priority, or in the top 3 at the moment?
Am I the best person to be managing this decision?
Is this something impactful for our family or the world?
Is this the best use of my family’s time, energy, and capital?
Why is this something that I, or another family member is passionate about or feels is important?
Why do I trust this person/investment/charity? Have I known them for a year?
If this project/investment/endeavour fails, can we/I withstand the loss? And if not, is it more important than the risk? Success or failure, what have I learned?
How have I verified this information being presented to me?
Is there a way I can trial or test this investment/person/opportunity before we fully commit?
Have I consulted at least one other family member and one of our family’s trusted advisors on this decision?
In 4 generations will this be important to my family and the world?
